phases.state: The mission is to locate a ball in a 50x50 meter field. The drone is positioned at (5,5) and is ready to begin scanning. It can scan 10x10 meter areas to identify which section contains the ball. No sections have been scanned yet.

phases.state: The mission is ongoing to locate the ball. The drone has scanned the first area and is now positioned at (15,5) to scan the next section. The previous scan did not detect the ball.
phases.phase_target: Scan the next 10x10 meter area from (10,0) to (20,10).

phases.state: We have a mission to locate and retrieve a ball. The robot dog is stationed at the starting point (25,25), awaiting the drone's scan results to identify the 10x10 meter block containing the ball.
phases.phase_target: Receive the coordinates of the 10x10 meter block containing the ball from the drone.

phases.state: We have a mission to locate and retrieve a ball. The robot dog has received the coordinates of the 10x10 meter block containing the ball and is ready to navigate to that block.
phases.phase_target: Move to the specified 10x10 meter block and begin scanning for the exact 1x1 meter cell containing the ball.

phases.state: We have a mission to locate and retrieve a ball. The robot dog is positioned at the 10x10 meter block and is scanning 2x2 meter squares to pinpoint the ball's exact location.
phases.phase_target: Identify the exact 1x1 meter cell within the block that contains the ball.

phases.state: We have a mission to locate and retrieve a ball. The robot dog has identified the exact 1x1 meter cell containing the ball and is ready to retrieve it.
phases.phase_target: Retrieve the ball from the identified location and return to the starting point at (25,25).
